post.text: Share this if you agree we need to keep moving forward, not back. hillaryclinton.com/makeaplan

comment.author: Travis
comment.text: As Wikileaks continues to release information, Hillary's support keeps dropping. It's nice that Hillary supporters with any sense of ethics, honesty, and character.. Are fleeing her.

replies.author: Omar
replies.text: Just retire from politics and go be a spokesperson for Depends adult diapers or go to prison. No more corrupt career politicians. That is why Trump is here we are tired of the corrupt career politicians, it's not about Republican or Democrat it's about change. Sick of the same old thing. At least half of America is trying to do something about our corrupt system. We can't keep electing the same corrupt career politicians and expect some great change, that doesn't make good sense. That goes for the House and Senate also.We should have term limits on all politicians. Time to move into 21st century politics, No more dynasties
